titleSection.name: VersionOne Mylyn Connector Integration with TaskTop
titleSection.shortDescription: View and update VersionOne work items directly from your IDE. Stories, defects, tasks and tests can be tracked, updated and closed without ever needing to leave the IDE.

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne Mylyn Connector integrates VersionOne's agile planning and project management platform with any Tasktop-enabled Eclipse-based IDE. Through integration with Tasktop Dev Pro, the VersionOne Connector also provides a standalone rich client application with offline access to VersionOne stories, defects and tasks.

linksSection.title: About the IBM/Rational Requisite Pro Connector

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
